info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flathead County through 1145 AM MDT... At 1059 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of East Glacier Park Village, or 41 miles east of Evergreen, moving northeast at 25 mph. Logan Pass and the Going To The Sun Road will be impacted. Water runoff along the road is possible as well. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Flathead County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
